mapper.sql: CGId, Year, Place, ClCode, ClName, ClGdp
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_classgdp where year = #{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_classgdp
CGId,
Year,
Place,
ClCode,
ClName,
ClGdp,
#{cgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{clcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{clname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{clgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mapper.update:
update tbl_classgdp
Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ClCode = #{clcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ClName = #{clname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ClGdp = #{clgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where CGId = #{cgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_classgdp set Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClCode = #{clcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClName = #{clname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClGdp = #{clgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where CGId = #{cgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
